item.description:
Please join me for the 11th Annual Lowell WinterFest.

About the Lowell Winterfest
Families from around New England can celebrate the wonders of winter at Lowell’s 11th Annual Winterfest Celebration. Festivities include live entertainment, arts & crafts, kids activities, outdoor ice skating, soup bowl competition and the crowd favorite – the National Human Dogsled Championship.

Schedule of Events:
http://lowell.org/Pag...

Our Planned Events:
2 PM - 4PM: All You Can Eat Chocolate Festival
Event includes free kids activities. Admission: $5 (kids under 5 admitted free). Location: St. Anne's Episcopal Church Hall (behind the church), corner of Merrimack and Kirk Streets

4:00PM- 5:30PM — Polar Party Continues at Club Celsius
4PM-5:30PM - The Cassettes

6PM — Fireworks Extravaganza
Winterfest comes to a close with our annual festive fireworks display over UMass Lowell's Tsongas Center!

6:30PM- 11:45PM — Polar Party Continues at Club Celsius
After 6 PM, Club Celsius is 21+ only with a $5 cover charge. Location: Arcand Drive
6:30PM-8PM - Entrain
8:30PM-11:45PM - Joshua Tree: The #1 U2 Tribute Band
item.how_to_find_us: We will meet in front of St Anne's church at 2 PM. I will have a Meetup sign. For those who will meet us later, I will send out alternate contact info.
item.name: Lowell WinterFest 2011
